message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a special price of $180. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $120?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a living. How about we meet in the middle at $165?
Ok, $165 is closer, but still a bit more than I'd like to spend.  How about $135?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I need to get a good price for it. I'm willing to go a bit lower, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $135. How about we meet at $155?
